thread.title: Facebook has blocked yet another advertisement – that asked questions from Modi | Libertarian
thread.title_full: Facebook has blocked yet another advertisement – that asked questions from Modi | Libertarian

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Facebook has blocked yet another advertisement – that asked questions from Modi | Libertarian
text:
(Before It's News)
Once again, FB has rejected a post from Swarna Bharat Party, India’s only liberal party.
This post, too, asked questions from Modi.
It was rejected, without any explanation. The explanation doesn’t make sense.
THE REJECTED POST
URL: https://www.facebook.com/SwarnaBharatParty/posts/1159480197413540
Screenshot below:
“EXPLANATION” provided:
It is now becoming clear that Facebook is committed to protecting killings of innocents.
I think someone in Facebook needs to ask what they are doing by blocking free speech in this manner.
